name: Anthony NICHOLS, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA TRAFFIC COURT, Respondent

parties: Anthony NICHOLS, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA TRAFFIC COURT, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of July, 2010, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
997 A.2d 1151
Anthony NICHOLS, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA TRAFFIC COURT, Respondent.
No. 45 EM 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 8, 2010.
